Source: MCNZ official fees, Immigration NZ, ExchangeRate-API, flight aggregators, insurance quotes
Notes: NZREX Route is the primary pathway for international medical graduates (IMGs) to practice in New Zealand. Total timeline: 12-24 months from application to registration. **Process Overview**: (1) NZREX Clinical Exam — this is a SINGLE clinical examination, not two separate parts. Fees: application fee NZ$817.06 + examination fee NZ$4,713.88 = NZ$5,530.94 total (per MCNZ fees effective 1 July 2025). Candidates must hold a qualifying primary medical qualification before sitting NZREX, (2) MCNZ Registration (application fee NZ$1248 + first year Annual Practicing Certificate NZ$1050 + provisional registration NZ$4000 = NZ$6298), (3) English proficiency (IELTS Academic 7.0+ or OET Grade B+ ~NZ$400), (4) Work visa (Accredited Employer Work Visa NZ$1540), (5) Immigration medical and chest X-ray (NZ$300-400), (6) Police clearance from India (INR 3000-3500), (7) Return flights India-Auckland (INR 60000-90000), (8) Initial accommodation 4 weeks temp housing + rental bond 4 weeks (NZ$2000-3000), (9) Document attestation/verification (MEA + NZ High Commission INR 25000-35000), (10) Optional NZREX prep course (varies INR 0-150000), (11) Temporary health insurance 3-6 months until employment (NZ$300-500). **Common Challenges**: NZREX Part 2 pass rate ~60-70% requires NZ clinical exposure. Provisional registration initially (2 years supervised practice required before full registration). Most positions are in public DHB system initially. **Min Cost** (INR 980000): No prep course budget accommodation single exam attempt — NZREX (301274) + MCNZ (343069) + IELTS (17000) + Visa (83884) + Medical NZ$300 (16341) + Police (3000) + Travel (60000) + Accommodation NZ$2000 (108940) + Attestation (25000) + Prep (0) + Insurance NZ$300 (16341). **Typical Cost** (INR 1263000): Basic prep course standard accommodation 1.5 avg exam attempts — adds NZREX Part 2 retake probability (0.5 x NZ$4879 = extra 132880) + standard prep (100000) + mid-range costs. **Max Cost** (INR 1640000): Premium prep course 2.5 NZREX Part 2 attempts extended temporary accommodation — NZREX Part 1 + 2.5x Part 2 (699912) + all costs at upper range + premium prep (150000). All costs in INR using exchange rate NZ$1 = INR 54.47 as of Feb 19 2026.
